categories: Category:Military personnel of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Masha was a male Human supply officer of the reconstituted Sith Empire living during the Galactic War. Following the Battle of Rishi, he was part of Darth Marr's force that traveled to Yavin 4 and established the anti-Revanite coalition along with Republic forces under Satele Shan.
Supply Officer Masha appears as the reputation vendor in the Star Wars: The Old Republic: Shadow of Revan expansion, released on December 2, 2014.
